name: Alex Kavanagh
bio: Haskell is a mind expanding language and I love the way it changes how you think about programming.  I'm still fairly new to Haskell, but was a seasoned Schemer in the past, and use FP techniques whenever they are appropriate.

name: Adrian King Legaspi
bio: Generally a Purely Functional Programming advocate and Professional Software Engineer in Scala/Haskell
